results.Name: Paris
results.Description: The capital city of France, known for the Eiffel Tower, museums, and cafes.
results.BestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to November

results.Name: Tokyo
results.Description: Japan's bustling capital, famous for its skyscrapers, shopping, and traditional temples.
results.BestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

results.Name: New York City
results.Description: The largest city in the USA, known for the Statue of Liberty, Times Square, and Central Park.
results.BestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to early November

results.Name: Sydney
results.Description: Famous for the Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches.
results.BestTimeToVisit: September to November, March to May

results.Name: Rome
results.Description: The capital of Italy, rich in history and architecture like the Colosseum and Vatican City.
results.BestTimeToVisit: April to June, late September to October

results.Name: Cape Town
results.Description: Known for Table Mountain, beaches, and vibrant culture.
results.BestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

results.Name: Rio de Janeiro
results.Description: Famous for its Carnival festival, Copacabana beach, and the Christ the Redeemer statue.

results.Name: Bangkok
results.Description: Thailand's capital, known for ornate temples, vibrant street life, and cultural landmarks.

results.Name: Dubai
results.Description: Known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and a lively nightlife scene.

results.Name: Istanbul
results.Description: A city that straddles Europe and Asia, known for historic sites like Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque.
results.BestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to November
